required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nebula Study - Screener Apps and HSAT vs. PSG Comparison
clinical_study.official_title: Nebula Study: Comparison of Sleep Screener Apps and Home Sleep Apnea Tests to Polysomnography

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, unblinded, open-label, single group study. All subjects will undergo concurrent screener app, HSAT testing, and in-lab polysomnography.

primary_outcome.measure: AHI value. Clinical decision for treatment output (Y to CPAP or N to CPAP) of Screener apps and HSAT compared to PSG.
primary_outcome.description: The PSG clinical decision for treatment is defined as AHIâ‰¥15. Screener apps and HSATs provide AHI values that will be used for comparison.

secondary_outcome.measure: OSA severity categories (normal, mild, moderate, severe) of Screnner apps and HSAT compared to PSG.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Concurrent PSG, HSAT, and Screener App Test
arm_group.description: Participants will undergo a single night baseline PSG test with concurrent HSAT tests as well as non-contact screening mobile apps through a smartphone.

intervention.arm_group_label: Concurrent PSG, HSAT, and Screener App Test

intervention.intervention_name: Home Sleep Apnea Test with FDA cleared devices
intervention.arm_group_label: Concurrent PSG, HSAT, and Screener App Test

intervention.description: Non-Contact Sleep Apnea Screening Applications at bedside table to assess for sleep apnea.
intervention.arm_group_label: Concurrent PSG, HSAT, and Screener App Test

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participant is 18 years of age or older
- Participant is willing to provide informed consent
- Participant is willing to participate in all study related procedures
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unable to cease PAP therapy during PSG (if currently using)
- Requires use of oxygen therapy during sleep
- Diagnosis of untreated clinically relevant sleep disorder (other than SDB)
- Pregnant
- Participant is unsuitable to participate in the study in the opinion of the investigator
- Participant has a permanent pacemaker, sustained non-sinus cardiac arrhythmias, and/or takes alpha blocker or short acting nitrate medication.
